Name: MOR...E TRAINER (Learning Morse Code)
About the game: SIMPLE AND EASY LEARNING MORSE CODE Morse code will always be relevant because of its simplicity and accessibility. It is a reliable way to communicate that will not fail in an emergency. And it is still widespread in the ham radio world. The app includes two of the most effective learning methods. The first one is a mnemonic technique based on memorizing the sound of characters instead of the number of dots and dashes. The second is the famous Koch method. These methods provide excellent results soon after start using the Mor...e Trainer App. The app has a converter of text to Morse code and sounding the code. Users can change settings of learning, sound, and more. FEATURES English, Spanish, Russian languages Latin & Cyrillic alphabet Mnemonic & Koch learning methods Translator of text to Morse code Transmission speed settings Customizable Morse sound frequency Advanced training settings EFFECTIVE TRAINING KOCH METHOD Before starting, set the parameters: speed, duration, level, etc. Memorize the sound of the displayed letters and symbols. Add new letters and symbols to exercise and continue training. MNEMONIC TECHNIQUE Learn mnemonic forms of letters. Learn to take characters by ear and distinguish them from each other. Try to receive a radio with no errors. TRANSLATOR TO MORSE CODE The Mor...e Trainer app has an integrated translator of text to Morse code and back that allows listening to a translated phrases. We hope you enjoy working with our app. We wish you success in learning Morse code!
